metadata.title: CVE-2019-11007 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In GraphicsMagick 1.4 snapshot-20190322 Q8, there is a heap-based bufferover-read in the ReadMNGImage function of coders/png.c, which allowsattackers to cause a denial of service or information disclosure via animage colormap.

criterions.comment: graphicsmagick: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
